newsitem.title: FINLAND: FINNISH JAN-MAY AIR BUSINESS TRIPS UP 23 PCT YR/YR.
newsitem.headline: FINNISH JAN-MAY AIR BUSINESS TRIPS UP 23 PCT YR/YR.

text.p: The number of business trips by air arranged by Finnish travel agency Suomem Matkatoimisto, part of national airline Finnair Oy , increased 23 percent year-on-year in January-May, the agency said on Wednesday.
Business travel by air in Finland increased 43 percent, it said in a statement.

Business trips from Finland to other European Union countries fell three percent while trips to Mexico increased most, by 79 percent year-on-year. Business air travel to China increased 23 percent, Suomen Matkatoimisto said.
